title: Custom Tracer Method Handler Crash
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2022.05.9-alpha-97e8c42d`

OS & Version: Ubuntu

Commit hash : `97e8c42d`

#### Expected behaviour
Don't crash

#### Actual behaviour
Crash

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Use this example file:
[test.txt](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/files/8827773/test.txt)

```
curl -H 'Content-Type: application/json' http://localhost:8545 -d "$(cat ./test.txt)"
```

This does work with Geth

#### Backtrace

````
[EROR] [06-02|20:54:20.572] RPC method debug_traceBlockByNumber crashed: interface conversion: interface {} is map[string]interface {}, not int64

[service.go:217 panic.go:838 runtime.go:2161 panic.go:838 vm.go:512 panic.go:838 iface.go:262 jsvm.go:82 tracer.go:135 jsvm.go:64 value.go:556 value.go:339 runtime.go:1756 vm.go:2658 vm.go:2630 vm.go:402 func.go:172 func.go:180 func.go:140 runtime.go:2166 vm.go:518 runtime.go:2165 jsvm.go:201 tracer.go:552 tracer.go:636 interpreter.go:313 evm.go:75 evm.go:273 instructions.go:695 interpreter.go:318 evm.go:75 evm.go:273 instructions.go:695 interpreter.go:318 evm.go:75 evm.go:399 instructions.go:759 interpreter.go:318 evm.go:75 evm.go:273 instructions.go:695 interpreter.go:318 evm.go:75 evm.go:399 instructions.go:759 interpreter.go:318 evm.go:75 evm.go:273 state_transition.go:412 state_transition.go:230 tracing.go:143 tracing.go:93 tracing.go:25 value.go:556 value.go:339 service.go:222 handler.go:458 handler.go:398 handler.go:347 handler.go:185 handler.go:275 asm_amd64.s:1571]
````

even simpler:
```
$ curl 127.0.0.1:8545 -H "Content-Type: application/json" --max-time 3 -s -d '{"id":"1","jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"debug_traceBlockByNumber","params":["latest",{"tracer":"{data: [], fault: function() {  }, result: function() {  }}"}]}'
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":"1","error":{"code":-32000,"message":"method handler crashed"}}
```
errors
```
Jun  6 11:31:29  erigon-node erigon[6652]: [EROR] [06-06|11:31:29.776] RPC method debug_traceBlockByNumber crashed: AssertFunction
Jun  6 11:31:29  erigon-node erigon[6652]: [service.go:217 panic.go:838 jsvm.go:198 tracer.go:552 tracer.go:636 interpreter.go:313 evm.go:75 evm.go:273 state_transition.go:412 state_transition.go:230 tracing.go:143 tracing.go:93 tracing.go:25 value.go:556 value.go:339 service.go:222 handler.go:458 handler.go:398 handler.go:347 handler.go:185 handler.go:275 asm_amd64.s:1571]
Jun  6 11:31:29  erigon-node erigon[6652]: [WARN] [06-06|11:31:29.776] Served                                   conn=127.0.0.1:60550 method=debug_traceBlockByNumber reqid=1 t=14.652861ms err="method handler crashed"
```

The same problem
Run:
`curl http://10.0.1.2:8545   -X POST   -H "Content-Type: application/json"   --data '{"method":"trace_block","params":["14962517"],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}'`
Got:
`{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"error":{"code":-32000,"message":"method handler crashed"}}`

```
Jun 15 10:18:06 arb-forta-node-1 rpcdaemon[3456891]: [EROR] [06-15|10:18:06.599] RPC method trace_block crashed: interface conversion: interface {} is *commands.CreateTraceResult, not *commands.TraceResult
Jun 15 10:18:06 arb-forta-node-1 rpcdaemon[3456891]: [service.go:217 panic.go:838 iface.go:262 trace_adhoc.go:370 evm.go:508 evm.go:583 evm.go:591 instructions.go:640 interpreter.go:318 evm.go:75 evm.go:273 state_transition.go:412 state_transition.go:230 trace_adhoc.go:1192 trace_filtering.go:489 trace_filtering.go:156 value.go:556 value.go:339 service.go:222 handler.go:493 handler.go:398 handler.go:347 handler.go:185 handler.go:275 asm_amd64.s:1571]
Jun 15 10:18:06 arb-forta-node-1 rpcdaemon[3456891]: [WARN] [06-15|10:18:06.599] Served                                   conn=65.108.15.62:56286 method=trace_block reqid=30880 t=34.08346ms err="method handler crashed"
```

I found more examples on BSC, that makes `erigon` panic:
```
root@bsc-erigon-archive-0:~# curl 127.0.0.1:8545 -H "Content-Type: application/json" --max-time 3 -s -d '{"id":"1","jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"debug_traceBlockByHash","params":["0xcd0b271775f4e95d034675766b9244edabacc9038854b7606d9a6d00aae11596",{"tracer":"{data: [], fault: function() {  }, result: function() {  }}"}]}'
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":"1","result":[{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":"1","error":{"code":-32000,"message":"method handler crashed"}}
root@bsc-erigon-archive-0:~#
```


I'm closing this issue, it has been fixed by https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/pull/5066
